frontMatter.title: 为什么这么设计
frontMatter.summary: 为什么这么设计（Why’s THE Design）是一系列关于计算机领域中程序设计决策的文章，我们在这个系列的每一篇文章中都会提出一个具体的问题并从不同的角度讨论这种设计的优缺点、对具体实现造成的影响。

prev.title: Don't get stuck in the I am an X developer.
prev.summary: You aren't a Go, or Rust, or Java, or Python, or JavaScript developer (unless you are writing those languages). In reality you are a developer who uses language X to solve Y problems. You can learn new languages and paradigms. Don't get stuck in the I am an X developer.

next.title: The 2023 Java Developer RoadMap
next.summary: A blog about Java, Programming, Algorithms, Data Structure, SQL, Linux, Database, Interview questions, and my personal experience.
